title: Beyond the Horror: Murder House Episode 10
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Not new but my favorite season is Hotel and I've seen all of the seasons.

Hey Mary! Question?? What if they did a theme for either Season 8 or Season 9 titled Apocalypse? I think it would be really cool to be honest & I think Ryan Murphy would do good with that type of story. Don't you agree? & another question for the next two confirmed next seasons 8 & 9 what would you personally pick for the theme? And do you think they'll renew it for a 10th season & petitional be the final season or do you think this show could go on further? Sorry for the long comment lol.
description:
VIDEO CONTAINS SPOILERS FOR SEASON ONE, EPISODE 10 OF AMERICAN HORROR STORY!!!

Beyond the Horror: Murder House, is an unofficial American Horror Story Live After Show. Hosted by MaryGirl Moody with Tami Sifford. We discuss and review each episode of American Horror Story Murder House. Join the Freaks of AHS on Facebook (link below), and Beyond the Horror.
